title: 3dMEPFM
description: Voxelwise deconvolution of Multiecho fMRI data to yield time-varying estimates of changes in transverse relaxation (DR2*) and optionally, net magnetization (DS0)

input_files.title: Input files
input_files.description: Dataset to analyze with Multiecho Paradigm Free Mapping, along with the echo time

dbgArgs.title: Debug arguments flag
dbgArgs.description: Enable R to save the parameters in .3dMEPFM.dbg.AFNI.args in the current directory

mask.title: Mask file
mask.description: Process voxels inside this mask only. Default is no masking.

hrf_model.title: HRF model
hrf_model.description: Haemodynamic response function used for deconvolution

verbosity.title: Verbosity level
verbosity.description: Verbosity level. 0 for quiet, 1 (default) or more: talkative.
